questions: Do you think the media gives us reliable information? Why or why not?
Tell me about a global problem that worries you.
Do you think education should be free for everyone?
Tell me about a leader you admire and why.
What are the effects of globalization on culture?
Do you think people should be allowed to work from anywhere?
Tell me about a controversial topic in your country.
Do you think exams are the best way to evaluate students?
Tell me about an experience that taught you something important.
Do you think science always benefits society?
Tell me about a social problem in your community.
Do you think people should retire earlier or later? Why?
Tell me about a book or film that made you think deeply.
Do you think money should be the main motivation at work?
Tell me about a historical event that you find interesting.
Do you think governments should do more to protect the environment?
Tell me about a decision that changed your life.
Do you think modern life is too stressful?
Tell me about an important change in your country.
Do you think it’s important to travel to understand other cultures?
Tell me about a technology you couldn’t live without.
Do you think young people today face more challenges than before?
Tell me about a time when you had to persuade someone.
Do you think art is important for society? Why?
tips: Speak clearly and for about 60 seconds.
